title: The Watchers
description: Evade patrolling spies to reach the exit.
objective: Navigate past the guards without being detected.
quote:
Patience is not the ability to wait,
but the ability to keep a good attitude
while waiting.

The Watchers never tire. You must be smarter.
victory_quote:
Impressive. You slipped past the
Watchers like a ghost.

Few have made it this far.
You're proving to be quite capable.
lore:
"You made it through the maze. Good.
 But now the real test begins.

 See those shadows moving in the
 corridors? Those are the Watchers.
 They patrol these halls endlessly,
 and if they spot you... let's just
 say you won't get a second chance.

 Study their patterns. Time your
 movements. The spaces between walls
 are your only cover.

 h, j, k, l got you this far.
 Now you'll need patience too.

 Reach the exit. Don't get caught."

                    â€” The Commander
